original_text: What could have been done more to my vineyard, that I have not done in it? wherefore, when I looked that it should bring forth grapes, brought it forth wild grapes?
korean_text: 내가 내 포도원을 위하여 행한 것 외에 무엇을 더할 것이 있으랴 내가 좋은 포도 맺기를 기다렸거늘 들포도를 맺음은 어찌 됨인고

sentences.original_text: What could have been done more
that I have not done in it?
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그 안에서 하지 않은 일이 무엇일까?

sentences.original_text: that it should bring forth grapes
